title: Hey, could you consider to make God King Skins gem-only?
body:
Imo Garens skin is his best now and Darius skin is even better than Garens imo. 

Garen has no Gem skin atm and Darius Dreadnova skin should NOT be a gem-skin. God King Darius has the most particles and looks far more superior to be a gem-skin.

That's my honest opinion and i do think many share this too. 

Thanks for making this - more fantasy - skins and even give Garen his first more serious skin (beside his lion who looks cool, but his a but cringe) 

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
